memberdef.name: muladd
memberdef.initializer: { \ uint32_t tl, th; \ { \ uint64_t t = (uint64_t)a * b; \ th = t >> 32; /* at most 0xFFFFFFFE */ \ tl = t; \ } \ c0 += tl; /* overflow is handled on the next line */ \ th += (c0 < tl); /* at most 0xFFFFFFFF */ \ c1 += th; /* overflow is handled on the next line */ \ c2 += (c1 < th); /* never overflows by contract (verified in the next line) */ \ VERIFY_CHECK((c1 >= th) || (c2 != 0)); \ }

detaileddescription.para: Add a*b to the number defined by (c0,c1,c2). c2 must never overflow.

memberdef.name: muladd_fast
memberdef.initializer: { \ uint32_t tl, th; \ { \ uint64_t t = (uint64_t)a * b; \ th = t >> 32; /* at most 0xFFFFFFFE */ \ tl = t; \ } \ c0 += tl; /* overflow is handled on the next line */ \ th += (c0 < tl); /* at most 0xFFFFFFFF */ \ c1 += th; /* never overflows by contract (verified in the next line) */ \ VERIFY_CHECK(c1 >= th); \ }

detaileddescription.para: Add a*b to the number defined by (c0,c1). c1 must never overflow.

memberdef.name: sumadd
memberdef.initializer: { \ unsigned int over; \ c0 += (a); /* overflow is handled on the next line */ \ over = (c0 < (a)); \ c1 += over; /* overflow is handled on the next line */ \ c2 += (c1 < over); /* never overflows by contract */ \ }

detaileddescription.para: Add a to the number defined by (c0,c1,c2). c2 must never overflow.

memberdef.name: sumadd_fast
memberdef.initializer: { \ c0 += (a); /* overflow is handled on the next line */ \ c1 += (c0 < (a)); /* never overflows by contract (verified the next line) */ \ VERIFY_CHECK((c1 != 0) | (c0 >= (a))); \ VERIFY_CHECK(c2 == 0); \ }

detaileddescription.para: Add a to the number defined by (c0,c1). c1 must never overflow, c2 must be zero.
Extract the lowest 32 bits of (c0,c1,c2) into n, and left shift the number 32 bits.
Extract the lowest 32 bits of (c0,c1,c2) into n, and left shift the number 32 bits. c2 is required to be zero.

memberdef.argsstring: (const secp256k1_scalar *a, unsigned int offset, unsigned int count)
memberdef.name: secp256k1_scalar_get_bits_limb32
